patterns_discovered: Error codes organized by semantic category
Helper functions to categorize and check error codes
Comprehensive error handling strategy with granular error classification
gotchas_discovered: Large number of error codes might lead to maintenance complexity

Requires careful mapping of errors to appropriate categories
recommendations: Consider using code generation for category checking to reduce maintenance
